body: 暂时不需要其他信息了，谢谢。等下周我找个 windows 机器测试下，抱歉排期比较紧。
Please reproduce it on http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html

[](url)

> Please reproduce it on http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html

刚加过了

As @Ovilia mentioned, I think if you intent to display both series in a tooltip, the x value should be the same.

If we make all of the series displayed in tooltip mandatorily in this case, 
when a axisPointer is on a X value and some series do not have Y value corresponding to that x value, 
which data item should be selected to show on tooltip?
I think it is not reasonable enough to choose a closest item to show on tooltip, because it may miss leading the readers.

I don't think you understand what I meant. Given that you have a series of with only one value, and the rest of them null. Then you should still be able to draw that one value. Take the real example where null indicates data loss.  Over a time series you have the following: [null, null, null, 100, null, null] (which indicates [dataLoss, dataLoss, dataLoss, DATA!, dataLoss,dataLoss,]) Then you would want to draw the line and area for 100 (DATA!), but not for the rest as you want to highlight that there is no data there. Using connect nulls, will give the user an indication that there actually is data there as the lines would be drawn.

In highcharts this is possible simply calling a function: https://api.highcharts.com/highcharts/lang

Maybe this would be also an option for here? I really need this feature without the need to rebuild the library every time there is an update.

i want to implement trend line in a line chart, but apparently i found out there is no property for trendline in echarts. However i have analyzed the formula for it, so i want to create a custom property for that, is there any way i can do that?
You mean there is no property for trend line in echarts

on line 24 put

        max: -20,

then check max on slider
it makes it zero instead of -20

this works for positive but not for negative numbers
yAxis is set right
@Ovilia Look at the picture below , The line curled around the point
@Guanrui1  能详细说一下吗，没怎么看懂这一块
好像还是存在这样的问题

I don't see it's a misleading. 
The difference is only 1 second, it is ignorable.
It's very common when you have multiple sourced time series data and their sampling rate are not synchronized.
If I don't have the option to do this (show the closest point), I am forced to modify the x value so that they are at the same x, but that would be misleading the viewers.

Thank you for your answer. I went to compare the code versions. The reason is that the old project is not updated in time.

>           Hi. What's the version of your SVG ECharts? I tried with the latest version and it's the same as canvas result.

@Ovilia 
I just download the example from "https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=candlestick-sh". It is using "<script type="text/javascript" src="http://echarts.baidu.com/gallery/vendors/echarts/echarts.min.js"></script>".
I only make below changes to support svg in the html.
var myChart = echarts.init(dom, null, {renderer: 'svg'});
It still has these issues.
Are there anything else do I need change?
@Ovilia Can you help?
Please follow these issue. And we do wish you could send us a pull request about them. Since you can see, there are so many features requested or bugs, it may take some time before we could fix them.
Seems to be a bug. Demo: http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xdCx-_CSuS&v=1

you can set `tooltip.formatter` or bind click events.
http://www.echartsjs.com/api.html#events.%E9%BC%A0%E6%A0%87%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B6
Hi. This should be improved later.
What's the problem here?
What's the URL?

some people like me prefer english, I translated some words to english using google translated.
Echarts is really really well developed, love it very much, hope my translated can help some people

I know I can set `rich` . 

But when I set rich on one item, other items' label style also changed, this is **unreasonable** .
you can set `series.label.normal.rich`, then  set `series.data[i].label.normal.rich`.
Thanks . It works. But I also think we had better to optimize it ranther than set `series.label.normal.rich` manuelly.
@smile1995 @zhangya5847 怎么解决的啊？怎么样，才能让y轴在同一个起点呢？
Any update/progress on this one?
I will close this issue, just wanted to share the translated version. Thanks!
@Ovilia Is this a bug? When can your team fix it? Thanks.
This doesn't seem to be the basic function of graphs. You can do it by expanding the parent container and calling resize.
You may add a custom series to make the trendline, whose data is the same as the line series. See http://echarts.apache.org/tutorial.html#Custom%20Series for more info.
Sorry, not have time to check it. I'll check it tomorrow.
which echarts version does this problem appear?
It's a common subpixel artifact in canvas when the pixel is not exactly on the x.5 position.  We will add optimization in this case.
@deqingli  4.2.0 rc 2
@wangyi7099  This is a known issue, and we have resolved it in the next release version, I have tested it.
How long will next version be released ?

这个bug是还没有彻底解决吗？我在echarts的主题工具页面看到了类似的问题，虽然markPoint的位置正确，但我觉得是因为数据累加了
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17642042/50129717-461aac00-02b5-11e9-85ae-5dfb302d5668.png)
This kind of situation is generally caused by different data. It is recommended to print out the data of the two charts to see it.
@GFwer  thank you for your feedback,  I will test it.

Thank you, @pissang! Interesting to see how you will fix it in the code.

> > > MarkPoint 目前版本确实做不到这件事。
> > > 如果不使用 MarkPoint，而是使用第一个单独的系列，例如 scatter，那么可以单独在此系列上定制
> > > trigger 为 'item' 的 tooltip。
> > 
> > 
> > 那么这个单独scatter系列里设置的tooltip和在option最外层设置的tooltip两者是否是独立的呢？我希望candlestick的tooltip始终固定位置，而scatter的tooltip可以被item的mouseover事件触发并跟随鼠标位置显示
> > 补充：经过亲自试验，这两个tooltip是同一个tooltip，但是当是axis触发的时候位置是固定的，当是item触发的时候tooltip位置根据scatter的position配置项而定（这个配置项可以设置为top、bottom、left、right等等）
> 
> 恐怕 scatter 里面 series.tooltip不会起作用吧

我的代码里的确是做到了

@pissang 你好，2019年有计划支持漏斗图高度这个特性吗？

找到问题了。。。我的问题；
@Ovilia @pissang 
文档中有这样的配置说明：series里面：
    dimensions: ['date', 'open', 'close', 'highest', 'lowest'],
    encode: {
        x: 'date',
        y: ['open', 'close', 'highest', 'lowest']
    }
其实k线图中的数据顺序应该是y: ['open', 'close', 'lowest', 'highest']；
因为低高顺序错误。。导致的；
series[i]-candlestick.data[i].value Array

The workaround was offered in @100pah 's answer.

That being said, the 'nameGap' property is – in my opinion – flawed, because the property should not really exist.
Rather, the 'nameGap' should be calculated internally, taking into account the length of the 'xAxis.axisLabels' and 'yAxis.axisLabels', as well as the 'rotate' property, which says how much labels should be rotated.

Any ideas?
也是遇到这个问题，请问如何解决呢？
老哥，问题解决了吗？求方法
@dimunidze  Please provide the code of the demo for us to debug.
@luotom  Should be `rgba(144, 160, 179, .9)` but not `rgb(144, 160, 179, .9)`.
Thanks
@Ovilia The problem about fixed node already sloved by @Clarkclk at #9488, just change 'setUnfixed=false' to 'setUnfixed=true' in echart.js
@ellyliang 请问最后是怎么解决的呢？我也是动态标签长短不一，会展示不全。
sorry, there is no official tutorial,  you can listen to the click events, and then call `setOption()`.
+1, I am also interested in potential solutions to blurry text when using canvas as the renderer (in my case it is in a treemap).
